data.title: Love Is Blind (feat. LAU)
data.meta_description:
Love Is Blind (feat. LAU) by NINA, released 05 June 2020

Gonna regret in the morning
Don’t waste your time
Gonna feel worse than when you first started
And you’ll feel the loneliness
If love is blind
Then why is it that no one cares tonight?
Can’t stop, I’m racing down the motorway, I know,
Won’t stop the feeling but I’m racing just like the speed of light
Oh give me someone that I can love
Give me someone cause that’s all I’ve got
Just take my heart and the rest of my devotion
Cause I am drowning, drowning, drowning so bad
Gonna forget in the morning
Why you first went out
Gonna drink all night and you’re still heavy hearted
And the memories remain
Can’t fight them back, you were trying to erase your mind
Can’t stop, I’m racing down the motorway I know
Won’t stop the feeling but I’m racing just like speed of light
Oh give me someone that I can love
Give me someone cause that’s all I’ve got
Just take my heart and the rest of my devotion
Cause I am drowning, drowning, drowning
Oh Give me something that I can have
Give me something cause that’s all I’ve got
Just take my love and the rest of my emotions
I’m tired of trying trying trying so hard
Life feels so long without direction
You’re my own reflection
Oh give me someone that I can love
Give me someone cause that’s all I’ve got
Just take my heart and the rest of my devotion
Cause I am drowning, drowning, drowning
Oh Give me something that I can have
Give me something cause that’s all I’ve got
Just take my love and the rest of my emotions
I’m tired of trying trying trying so hard
They say that love is blind
Give me someone
